data.name: plPostsPerPage.Help
data.value:
The number of posts displayed on one page at once.
NOTE
Per user settings this is overriden. Applicable to unauthenticated users ONLY.

data.name: plPopularPostsView.Help
data.value: The number of post views before a thread becomes popular.

data.name: plPopularPostsReply.Help
data.value: The number of post replies before a thread becomes popular.

data.name: plFisrtRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 1st ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '1st Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plSecondRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 2nd ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '2nd Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plThirdRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 3rd ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '3rd Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plFourthRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 4th ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '4th Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plFifthRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 5th ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '5th Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Forum - Statistics & Rankings


This area is accessible only by administrators. This is divided into four seperate sections.

Post Ranks
This section controls if user post rankings are enabled/disabled. If enabled, there are five levels you can configure the number of posts to achieve this status.

Statistics
This section determines if statistics are enabled for this module. If so, setting a value in hours to determine how often the statistics are updated in the database.

Thread 'Hot' Status
This section determines if a post is listed as hot or just displays normal. A post needs a combination of a certain number of replies and a certain number of views input by the administrator to display as hot.

Ratings
This section allows you to configure if the post ratings are enabled/disabled.

data.name: plRatings.Help
data.value: If checked, the forums will display ratings of threads and also give registered users the ability to add their own rating per thread.

data.name: plRankings.Help
data.value: If checked, rankings will be enabled in user posts avatar area.

data.name: plEigthRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 8th ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '8th Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plNinthRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 9th ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '9th Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plSeventhRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 7th ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '7th Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plSixthRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 6th ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '6th Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: plTenthRank.Help
data.value:
Number of posts that are required before a user becomes 10th ranked poster status.
NOTE
If left blank, default localized value of: '10th Level Poster' will be shown.

data.name: pl10thRating.Help
data.value:
The word displayed in place of the numbering system for the equivalent of 10 star rating.
NOTE
If left blank, default of: '10 out of 10 - based on x ratings' will be used.

data.name: pl1stRating.Help
data.value:
The word displayed in place of the numbering system for the equivalent of a 1 star rating.
NOTE
If left blank, default of: '1 out of 10 - based on x ratings' will be used.

data.name: pl2ndRating.Help
data.value:
The word displayed in place of the numbering system for the equivalent of 2 star rating.
NOTE
If left blank, default of: '2 out of 10 - based on x ratings' will be used.

data.name: pl3rdRating.Help
data.value:
The word displayed in place of the numbering system for the equivalent of 3 star rating.

data.name: pl4thRating.Help

data.name: pl5thRating.Help
data.value:

data.name: pl6thRating.Help
data.value:

NOTE
If left blank, default of: '6 out of 10 - based on x ratings' will be used.

data.name: pl7thRating.Help
data.value:

If left blank, default of: '7 out of 10 - based on x ratings' will be used.

data.value:
The word displayed in place of the numbering system for the equivalent of 8 star rating.

If left blank, default of: '8 out of 10 - based on x ratings' will be used.

data.name: pl9thRating.Help
data.value:
The word displayed in place of the numbering system for the equivalent of 9 star rating.
NOTE
If left blank, default of: '9 out of 10 - based on x ratings' will be used.

data.name: plEnableRankingImage.Help
data.value:
If checked, images will be shown in place of text for post ranking status. The image tooltips will match the Title set for each level.
NOTE
When disabled, the set Title for each level will be shown unless it is blank in which case the default localized values will be used.

data.name: plNoRanking.Help
data.value: No post ranking count can be set here, but a title can be set to override the localized display of Not Ranked.
